events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car on Main Street during rush hour traffic.
Assigned claim category as Auto Accident based on initial description of the car collision and damages.
A claims agent was assigned to handle this automobile accident case and to contact the claimant shortly.
Sent an acknowledgment email to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining next steps.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimates from the claimant for further processing.
Received all requested documents including police report and repair cost estimates within the expected timeframe.
Investigation commenced to verify accident circumstances and assess liability using submitted documents.
Completed investigation confirming that the claimant was not at fault and damages align with incident description.
Proposed a settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses during repair period.
Customer responded with gratitude, expressing satisfaction with the timely and fair settlement proposal.
Final approval given for the claim after customer acceptance of the settlement agreement and terms.
Issued payment to repair shop and rental car agency as per agreed settlement to close the claim.
Closed the claim file successfully after confirming repairs completed and customer satisfaction.
Archived all claims and related documents in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
